inclusion.criterion: Triple negative breast cancer / HER2-positive breast cancer (ER / PR +/-)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: morphologically confirmed diagnosis of breast cancer, IIA-IIIA stage
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: life expectancy of more than 3 months.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: the consent of patients to use reliable methods of contraception throughout the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequate liver and bone marrow function
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: the absence of contraindications to surgical intervention (including anesthetic risk)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Conducting earlier any systemic therapy for breast cancer.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: carrier mutations of the BRCA1 / 2 gene
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: severe uncontrolled concomitant chronic diseases or acute diseases
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: acute conditions and complications, which, according to the doctor, interfere with treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. A core biopsy revealed a 3 cm invasive ductal breast carcinoma in the left upper outer quadrant.
